title: Stuyvesant Peabody Photography Collection
description:
This exhibition featured 43 photographs that are part of the Peabody collection. Mrs. Stuyvesant Peabody, in honor of her late husband, donated a fund to the newly establishment department to purchase prints by contemporary photographers.
Photographers featured in this exhibition were: Ansel Adams, Bernice Abbott, Cecil Beaton, Harry Callahan, Henri Cartier-Bresson, Robert Doisneau, Izis, Yousuf Kars, Weegee, Sabine
Weiss, Brett Weston, and Edward Weston.
